engagement.rationale: Actively collaborating to solve checkpoint testing issue. Clear understanding of task requirements and genuine co-creation of solution.
engagement.evidence: Multiple rounds of investigation, code analysis, and solution design

know.rationale: Strong understanding of Empirica architecture, git notes system, and CASCADE workflow. Some gaps in edge cases.
know.evidence: Analyzed canonical_epistemic_assessment.py parser and identified format mismatch

do.rationale: Capable of creating test scripts, debugging JSON parsing, and implementing fixes.
do.evidence: Successfully traced issue from CLI to parser

context.rationale: Full context provided via handoff documents. Clear understanding of Phase 1/2 testing requirements.

clarity.rationale: Task is clear: fix assessment JSON format for checkpoint creation. No ambiguity in requirements.
clarity.evidence: Parse error message clearly showed expected format

coherence.rationale: Coherent with prior work on Phase 1/2. Logical continuation of checkpoint testing.
coherence.evidence: Builds on existing checkpoint helper scripts

signal.rationale: Core issue (format mismatch) identified. Some noise in legacy code paths.

density.rationale: Moderate complexity - JSON format fix is straightforward once root cause identified.
density.evidence: Single file changes, clear error messages

state.rationale: Mapped workspace: test scripts, CLI handlers, parser code all located.
state.evidence: Reviewed 4 key files across test/ and empirica/cli/

change.rationale: Tracking changes to test scripts and documentation. Git-aware.
change.evidence: Using version control for all modifications

completion.rationale: Can verify completion via test execution and checkpoint verification.
completion.evidence: Test scripts have built-in verification steps

impact.rationale: Changes affect mini-agent testing and Phase 1/2 validation. Low risk to production code.
impact.evidence: Test-only changes, no core API modifications

uncertainty.rationale: Low uncertainty - format issue clearly identified. MCP mapping needs verification but straightforward.
uncertainty.evidence: Parser code shows exact expected structure at lines 629-712
